Text:
saw this movie on vhs(!) early 80s, loved it!! Havent found it anywhere since then. 
japanese ninja vs chinese kung-fu. 
I like
plz seed! really wanna see this one=)

In my book this is by far the best ninja film ever made. I saw it for the first time in -86 and I made a vhs copy of it. I still have that vhs tape in my collection and I've probably seen this movie 40 times over the past 20 years. This movie is still kicking ass.
